archimate:Device.name: Clinical-Use Laptops (CL)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
Clinical documentation, EMR access, real-time patient chart updates, bedside patient management, labs, and pharmacy orders.
Specifications:
• Processor type: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen /7 • Memory capacity: 32 GB RAM • Storage capacity: 1TB SSD • Screen size and resolution: 13–15 inches, Full HD touchscreen (1920 x 1080). Anti-glare touchscreen – helps reduce eye strain in bright hospital environments. • Battery life: Minimum 10 hours • Operating system: Windows 11 Pro (Healthcare-ready version preferred) • Connectivity options: Wi-Fi 6 (ensure compliance with access points)/6E, Bluetooth 5.1, Ethernet (via adapter and dock), LTE • Ports and expansion slots: USB-A (x2), USB-C (Thunderbolt or power/video output), HDMI, headphone/microphone jack • Graphics capabilities: Integrated graphics • Build quality and weight: Medical-grade antimicrobial coating, spill-resistant keyboard, rugged construction, under 4 lbs. • Protective Equipment: Ruggedized medical-grade case and screen protector • Included peripherals: Mouse and Keyboard
• Security Features:
o RFID or biometric authentication for secure login/logout o Privacy screen filter integrated or attached o Remote management and location tracking capability o TPM 2.0 security module for encryption of patient data o Compliant with HIPAA and relevant data security standards.
• Docking Station Support: If used in multiple locations (nurses’ stations, ICU, etc.), ensuring compatibility with a universal dock will enhance workflow.
• Fanless or Quiet Cooling Design – Reduces noise pollution in quiet clinical environments.
